name: Community Service (IzzyR)
description:
Welcome to a very short game jam game!

A man who was peacefully doing his time in prison, is killed in his sleep by his bunk bed. Awakening as a grim reaper, he is thrown into the deep end of saving souls to attend for his crimes to avoid being sent to hell. 

Spin your way through three different mazes to reach the lost souls on the other side so they may pass on.

If you get stuck or fly off the map, just press R to reset or Esc to return to main menu (and restart from scratch..!)
